de.lukaskoerfer.gradle.magicdraw.extensions

Class MagicDrawExtension

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lukaskoerfer.gradle.magicdraw.extensions.MagicDrawExtension

  • public class MagicDrawExtension
extends Object
    Provides a project extension for general MagicDraw settings

    • Method Detail

      • getInstallDir

        @Generated(value="lombok")
public DirectoryProperty getInstallDir()
        Gets the MagicDraw installation directory.

        A default value can be set via the project property magicDraw.installDir. It is required to specify this property either directly or via the project property. If this property has not been set until the end of the configuration phase, the build will fail.

        Returns:
        The previously set installation directory or the default value or null, if neither has been set

      • setInstallDir

        @Generated(value="lombok")
public void setInstallDir(DirectoryProperty installDir)
        Sets the MagicDraw installation directory.

        A default value can be set via the project property magicDraw.installDir. It is required to specify this property either directly or via the project property. If this property has not been set until the end of the configuration phase, the build will fail.

        Parameters:
        installDir - The base directory of the MagicDraw installation

      • getPlugins

        @Generated(value="lombok")
public SinglePluginDescriptorContainer getPlugins()
        Gets a container for MagicDraw plugin descriptors
        Returns:
        A MagicDraw plugin descriptor container
